name: A Stickman Assassin (17+) - Blood And Guts Edition
name_original: A Stickman Assassin (17+) - Blood And Guts Edition
description:
Grab your weapon, and get ready for a wild, action packed shooter game! Choose from a variety of cool stickman assassins as you blast your way though all the bad guys!

FEATURES

- All characters unlocked. How cool is that!
- Action packed stickman style game.
- Cool graphics.
